text: Centromyrmex feae, is a species of ant of the subfamily Ponerinae. There are 3 subspecies recognized. ==Subspecies== *Centromyrmex feae ceylonicus Forel, 1900 \- Sri Lanka *Centromyrmex feae greeni Forel, 1901 \- Singapore *Centromyrmex feae feae (Emery, 1889) \- Philippines, Cambodia, India, Myanmar, Taiwan, Thailand, Vietnam, China ==References== ==External links== * * at antwiki.org *Animaldiversity.org *Termites and Ants Category:Ponerinae Category:Hymenoptera of Asia Category:Insects described in 1889
title: Centromyrmex feae
